metadata.name: Aurore
metadata.description:
This artwork titled ‘Aurore’ is a part of ‘The Endless Dream’ collection, which is a series of digital paintings. Each painting in this series sets a mood and elicits a heartfelt emotion. 
As the collection comes together every artwork adds to the dream, weaving a visual story.

Details:
Year: 2022
Artwork Size: 3000 x 3000 pixels | 300 dpi
